alert.note: Alert for Knox (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:57PM CDT until May 16 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL KNOX COUNTY... At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Knoxville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Halls, Maloneyville, Lake Forest, Mascot, Powell, Kimberlin Heights and Seymour. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 383 and 401. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 108 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
